mapper.sql: cat_id, cat_name, cat_parent_id, type_id, cat_sort, cat_grade, cat_seo_title, cat_seo_keyword, cat_seo_desc, cat_is_show, cat_delflag, cat_create_name, cat_create_time, cat_modified_name, cat_modified_time, cat_del_name, cat_del_time, cat_rate, cat_model
mapper.select: select cate1.cat_name as parent_name, cate.cat_id, cate.cat_name, cate.cat_parent_id, cate.type_id, cate.cat_sort, cate.cat_grade, cate.cat_seo_title, cate.cat_seo_keyword, cate.cat_seo_desc, cate.cat_is_show, cate.cat_delflag, cate.cat_create_name, cate.cat_create_time, cate.cat_modified_name, cate.cat_modified_time, cate.cat_del_name, cate.cat_del_time, cate.cat_rate, cate.cat_model from np_third_grantcat cat, np_goods_category cate left join np_goods_category cate1 on cate.cat_parent_id = cate1.cat_id where cate.cat_id = cat.cate_id and cat.third_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and cat.del_flag='0' and cate.cat_delflag = '0'

select cate1.cat_name as parent_name, cate.cat_id, cate.cat_name, cate.cat_parent_id, cate.type_id, cate.cat_sort, cate.cat_grade, cate.cat_seo_title, cate.cat_seo_keyword, cat.modify_time, cate.cat_seo_desc, cate.cat_is_show, cate.cat_delflag, cate.cat_create_name, cate.cat_create_time, cate.cat_modified_name, cate.cat_modified_time, cate.cat_del_name, cate.cat_del_time, cate.cat_rate, cate.cat_model from np_third_grantcat cat, np_goods_category cate left join np_goods_category cate1 on cate.cat_parent_id = cate1.cat_id where cate.cat_id = cat.cate_id and cat.third_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and cat.del_flag='0' and cate.cat_delflag = '0' order by cat.modify_time desc limit #{startRowNum},#{endRowNum}

select count(1) from np_third_grantcat cat, np_goods_category cate left join np_goods_category cate1 on cate.cat_parent_id = cate1.cat_id where cate.cat_id = cat.cate_id and cat.third_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and cat.del_flag='0' and cate.cat_delflag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into np_goods_category (cat_id, cat_name, cat_parent_id, type_id, cat_sort, cat_grade, cat_seo_title, cat_seo_keyword, cat_seo_desc, cat_is_show, cat_delflag, cat_create_name, cat_create_time, cat_modified_name, cat_modified_time, cat_del_name, cat_del_time, cat_rate, cat_model) values (#{catId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catSeoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catSeoKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catSeoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catIsShow,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{catDelflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{catCreateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catModifiedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catModifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catDelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catDelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{catModel,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update np_goods_category
cat_name = #{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cat_parent_id = #{catParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cat_sort = #{catSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cat_grade = #{catGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cat_seo_title = #{catSeoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cat_seo_keyword = #{catSeoKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cat_seo_desc = #{catSeoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cat_is_show = #{catIsShow,jdbcType=CHAR},
cat_delflag = #{catDelflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
cat_create_name = #{catCreateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cat_create_time = #{catCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cat_modified_name = #{catModifiedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cat_modified_time = #{catModifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cat_del_name = #{catDelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cat_del_time = #{catDelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cat_rate = #{catRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cat_model = #{catModel,jdbcType=CHAR},
where cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update np_goods_category set cat_name = #{catName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_parent_id = #{catParentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cat_sort = #{catSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cat_grade = #{catGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cat_seo_title = #{catSeoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_seo_keyword = #{catSeoKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_seo_desc = #{catSeoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_is_show = #{catIsShow,jdbcType=CHAR}, cat_delflag = #{catDelflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, cat_create_name = #{catCreateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_create_time = #{catCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cat_modified_name = #{catModifiedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_modified_time = #{catModifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cat_del_name = #{catDelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_del_time = #{catDelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cat_rate = #{catRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cat_model = #{catModel,jdbcType=CHAR} where cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT cat_id,cat_name FROM np_goods_category WHERE cat_parent_id = '0' AND cat_grade = '1' AND cat_delflag = '0'
